We will provide you with a list of companies, contact details and company data, your key responsibility from this would be generating new business and keeping track of the sales pipeline through our CRM.What you'll get in returnPrimarily this is a commission based role only. The product has two phase.The front end product which cost $697 and you will be making 40% commission on every sale that is $278.80 and the upsell product which cost $147 that you will also be making 40% commission on. The marketing materials and the email copies which are already tested and proven to work is available for you to use.You will also get access to your personal affiliate dashboard to track your affiliate links and sales you are making and your commissions are paid through PayPal or check. So the more targeted leads you drive to this offer and they make a purchase the more money you will be making.So if this is something that interests you and you will like to jump on board and start promoting the product as an affiliate, you can please message me and I will send you the link to sign up for free as an affiliate to start promoting.
